name: To the days with you, Piano!
name_original: To the days with you, Piano!
description:
Feel happy when playing the music but also stressful under everyday training? In this game you can freely perform music to fight against those boring exercise!

With the rock version of the famous music Canon, try to make a perfect performance and defeat all those difficulties on the sheets!

Experience on PC may be a little hard, we will process on a mobile version later.
